com.irhad.voyager
Class LinksVoyager

java.lang.Object
  com.irhad.voyager.LinksVoyager

public class LinksVoyager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for voyaging the links of a website, deciding which ones should be processed, and then testing the connections to the detected links.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Irhad Elezovikj Teacher: Nahit Yilmaz Project Mentors: Elchin Asgarov, Semir Elezovikj
